name: BasiGX
creator: terrestris GmbH & Co. KG
author: terrestris GmbH & Co. KG
summary: Basic Components for ExtJS 6 and GeoExt 3
description: Basic Components for ExtJS 6 and GeoExt 3
detailedDescription: This package consists of several components that can be used to setup an Application based on ExtJS 6, GeoExt 3 and OL3

scripts.ci-coverage: npm run clean-coverage && istanbul instrument src -o src_instrumented && mv src src_old && mv src_instrumented src && istanbul cover npm run save-coverage && mv src src_instrumented && mv src_old src && istanbul report --root ./coverage lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.html-coverage: npm run clean-coverage && istanbul instrument src -o src_instrumented && mv src src_old && mv src_instrumented src && istanbul cover npm run save-coverage && mv src src_instrumented && mv src_old src && istanbul report --root ./coverage html
